title: Sundown at Granada
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lower Greenville neighborhood beer garden and restaurant opened by the owner of the historic Granada Theater live music venue. Offers several vegetarian choices including a quinoa veggie patty burger (has dairy cream), a vegetable wrap (has cheese), a soba noodle, plus salads. Features a double decker patio and selection of 60+ beers and specialty cocktails. Live music nightly from 11pm.
